question: The 2020 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup is scheduled to be held in which country?
explanation: The 7th edition of FIFA U-17 Women\'s World Cup 2020 will be hosted by India from 2nd to 21st November 2020. The host cities for the tournament are yet to be approved with FIFA. Spain are the defending champions. India had previously hosted the men\'s U-17 World Cup in 2017.
